amendment.description: Amendment provides an additional $5,000,000 to fund School-Based Health Centers to support preventative and mental health services for children and adolescents in school.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 71 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to provide an additional $5,000,000 to fund School-Based Health Centers to support preventative and mental health services for children and adolescents in school.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pressley amendment (A067) Agreed to by recorded vote: 342 - 77, 1 Present (Roll no. 316).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pressley amendment (A067) Agreed to by recorded vote: 342 - 77, 1 Present (Roll no. 316).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A067) offered by Ms. Pressley.
